articles.title: Rugby-Wallabies are not focused on Cheika factor: Wright

articles.title: Soccer Player Arrested in Argentina After Sucker-Punching Woman Ref
articles.description: The player attacked the referee from behind. Luckily, his punch seemed to mostly miss her head, but she was still taken to a hospital.
articles.content:
A footballer in Buenos Aires was arrested after he sucker-punched a woman referee from behind.
The attack came after the player was called for a foul and one of his teammates was issued a yellow card.
The referee went to a hospital and wants the play... [2811 chars]

articles.title: Argentina exported $3.2 bln in farm products in July -export chamber
articles.description: Argentine exports of grain, oilseeds, and their derivatives hit $3.16 billion in July.
articles.content:
BUENOS AIRES, Aug 1 (Reuters) - Argentine exports of grain, oilseeds, and their derivatives hit $3.16 billion in July, the South American country's CIARA-CEC chamber of oilseed crushers and export companies said on Monday.

articles.title: TV series focuses on eerie afterlife of Argentina's 'Santa Evita'
articles.description: The life of Argentina's legendary First Lady Evita Peron left an indelible mark on her country, but in the years after she died in 1952 a bizarre tale unfolded in which her embalmed remains took center stage.

articles.content:

articles.title: LATAM POLITICS TODAY-Argentina launches latest effort to tackle economic crisis
articles.description: Argentina's Fernandez bets on 'superministry' to stop economic bleeding Argentine President Alberto Fernandez launched his latest effort to tackle an economy in crisis on Thursday, tapping one of the ruling coalition's most powerful figures to lead a new "superministry" on the same day the central bank hiked its key interest rate to 60%.
